creditline: Gift of Ruth and Bruce Dayton
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: Rectangular in shape; carved on top with two boys walking one playing an instrument and one holding a lotus frond; fruit tree at R; flying bird at top
inscription:
Inscription

moulded, on back: [Yun mou (cloud ink)] and [xiao yuan (morning breaks on the horizon)] 

moulded, on PR side: [Qianlong nian zhi]
title: Ink Cake
